entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 5:48 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: NNW 35 km/h gust 78 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
